teaser: Nilay Patel, managing editor of Vox, explains what the fast lane is and why it's like the TSA's pre-check option. Plus, it's time for Silicon Tally, our weekly quiz on the week in tech. This time around, we're joined by Terry Bush, a Marketplace Tech listener from South Bend, Indiana
title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, May 16, 2014
description: Nilay Patel, managing editor of Vox, explains what the fast lane is and why it's like the TSA's pre-check option. Plus, it's time for Silicon Tally, our weekly quiz on the week in tech. This time around, we're joined by Terry Bush, a Marketplace Tech listener from South Bend, Indiana
